Monitor the adjacent vehicle on the left for any changes in lane or speed. Since it is nighttime, reduce speed appropriately to ensure safe stopping distances and compensate for limited visibility. Continue to scan the road for any traffic signs, lights, or additional road users that may become visible as the ego car approaches. Proceed with caution given the proximity and uncertain actions of the heavy truck.
